text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

translation.en: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them by His [wise] judgement. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Knowing
translation.id: Sungguh, Tuhanmu akan menyelesaikannya (perkara) di antara mereka dengan hukum-Nya, dan Dia Mahaperkasa, Maha Mengetahui
